Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 2nd overall pick, by Kansas City in 1965...
Earned first career win on 4/4/1965...
Had first career hit on 4/27/1966, off Joe H. Coleman (BOS)...
Injured on 4/29/1972 with a Ruptured Bicep Tendon, out for 7 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/29/1973, winning 2 games with a 1.08 ERA...
Was selected to the 1974 Allstar game...
